definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)
to trust/to entrust/to be entrusted with/to act as trustee

sentences.english: The adult likes to lay eggs in the exocuticle of the receptacle.
sentences.chinese: 成虫喜产卵于巳开放之花朵的花托外表皮内。

sentences.english: The ovary appears to have sunk into and fused with the cup-shaped receptacle.
sentences.chinese: 子房凹入杯状花托中并且与之合生。

sentences.english: Also consider even detail point to help somebody attain his aim, the chair foot with simple modelling resembles thalamus .
sentences.chinese: 连细节处也考虑周全，造型简单的椅脚就像花托。

sentences.english: Only the styles are left sticking up from the receptacle and ovary .
sentences.chinese: 在花托和子房上面只剩下花柱。

sentences.english: The ripened ovaries are small achenes on the surface of the receptacle, as in the strawberry.
sentences.chinese: 成熟子房为花托表面的小瘦果，如草莓。

sentences.english: The floral nectary in Litchi chinensis is a disc nectary located between calyx and ovary on receptacle.
sentences.chinese: 荔枝花蜜腺呈盘状，位于子房和花萼之间的花托上。

sentences.english: The vascular bundle of ovule of Phytolacca is evidently from the vascular tissue of receptacle.
sentences.chinese: 商陆属植物的胚珠维管束明显地来自花托的维管组织。

sentences.english: Adventitious buds were induced directly from floral receptacle, but not from leaf.
sentences.chinese: 花托能直接诱导分化不定芽，叶片则不能。
